sense.def:
To recall something
pomeni, da si nekaj znova prikličemo v spomin.

seg.quote: I recalled that my blankets had been taken away.
‘I ran outside to look for my children,’ recalled Miriam.
I started to recall the years after the War.
Deirdre recalled seeing a poster on his wall.

sense.def:
To recall someone to a place
pomeni ukazati človeku, naj se vrne v določen kraj.

seg.quote: Eighteen months ago they recalled him to Mozambique.
